tag_list: apogeeinvent, software-development, artificial-intelligence, ceo, product2web, auto-search-online, social-media-services, enterprise-development-firm
overview:
Beto Paredes has worked in the Software and Internet development industry for over 10 years. He holds executive level positions in several progressive technology corporations.

With his team, Paredes has created the backbone infrastructure for several multi million dollar companies such as WBS Connect, Media Breakaway (Inc. 500), and Ultima Online Marketing. Working with software engineers, CIOs, CTOs, creative departments and large sales teams, he directs a network of over 40 professionals in the Software and Internet development arena.

Paredes launched ApogeeInvent, a full software solutions and web development company, with partner Joseph Frazier in 1994. Based out of the Rexburg Idaho and Portland Oregon, ApogeeInvent provides clients with multiple levels of assistance in growing concepts into fully functioning, profitable companies.

Paredes also spends considerable time traveling the country to speak on IT and Internet development at Universities, The IT Summit, Affiliate Conventions, Non-profit Organizations, and numerous other events; teaching top-level executives from the private sector, government, education, and economic development communities about artificial intelligence, online marketing technologies and SEO.

milestones.description: With CEO Brandon McDonald Beto Paredes launched Product2Web, Inc at Ad-Tech San Francisco 2009.  The new business launch was hugely succesful and you can find details here http://www.Product2Web.com/
